test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function with wrong arity.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-2
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function with wrong argument type.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-3
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:string function and no prefix. Uses fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-4
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to xs:string function and no prefix Uses fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-5
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to xs:string function and with prefix

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-6
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:string function and with prefix.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-7
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function with argument set to empty sequence. Uses fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-8
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function with a prefix that is not defined.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-9
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:upper-case.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-10
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:lower-case.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-11
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:lower-case.

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:substring-before.

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:substring-after.

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:string-length.

test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:substring.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-16
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:string-join.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-17
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:starts-with.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-18
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function as argument to fn:ends-with.

test-case.name: fn-prefix-from-qname-20
test-case.description: Evaluation of fn-prefix-fromQName function with two namespaces declared with same namespace (different case).

test-case.name: K-PrefixFromQName-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `prefix-from-QName()`.

test-case.name: K-PrefixFromQName-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `prefix-from-QName(1, 2)`.

test-case.name: K-PrefixFromQName-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(prefix-from-QName( () ))`.

test-case.name: K-PrefixFromQName-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `prefix-from-QName( QName("example.com/", "pre:lname")) eq "pre"`.
